original_text: The border goes from the Mediterranean Sea to Hazar-Enan. The border of Hamath is on the north side and the border of Damascus is on the south side. That is the north border of your land.
korean_text: 그 경계선이 바닷가에서부터 다메섹 경계선에 있는 하살에논까지요 그 경계선이 또 북쪽 끝에 있는 하맛 경계선에 이르렀나니 이는 그 북쪽이요

sentences.original_text: The border goes from the Mediterranean Sea to Hazar-Enan.
The border of Hamath is on the north side
and the border of Damascus is on the south side.
That is the north border of your land.
